availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hyram A. Boyd (Campbell County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Boyd. Father of Mary Boyd. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860. Farmer in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p.866.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 1, June & July 1863, p. 31 (p. 66 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on May 29, 2020).
